ana šarri bēlīya urdaka Bel-eriba lū šulmu ana šarri bēlīya x x x x x Adda-rami x x x x x ahūla x x x x x-iq x x x x x šarri bēlīya x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x ab x+x x x x x idullu i-si-x x x x x-im-ma ša alqûni x x x x+x harrāni ūbilūni x x x kētu ūmâ x x x x sissê x x x x-ni 03 sissê x x x x x+x ina muhhi 03 sissê x x x x irtuʾubu x x x x x+x a x x x x x x x
